trans-unit.source: Describes a character buffer for a text run.
trans-unit.target: Descreve uma memória intermédia de carateres para uma execução de texto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> structure using a specified unsafe character string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> estrutura através de uma cadeia de carateres não seguro especificado.

trans-unit.source: The caller needs unmanaged code permission in order to invoke the CharacterBufferReference method.
trans-unit.target: O autor da chamada necessita da permissão de código não gerido para invocar o método CharacterBufferReference.

trans-unit.source: Pointer to character string.
trans-unit.target: Apontador para a cadeia de carateres.

trans-unit.source: The length of `unsafeCharacterString`.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento de `unsafeCharacterString`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> structure using a specified character array.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> estrutura através de uma matriz de carácter especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> array.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Char>matriz.</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The offset to the first character to use in `characterArray`.
trans-unit.target: O desvio para o primeiro caráter para utilizar no `characterArray`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> structure using a specified character string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> estrutura através de uma cadeia de carateres especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> containing the text characters.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.String>que contém os carateres de texto.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The offset to the first character to use in `characterString`.
trans-unit.target: O desvio para o primeiro caráter para utilizar no `characterString`.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado é igual a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para a comparação com a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se obj é igual a atual objeto; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: If obj is not a object, is returned.
trans-unit.target: If obj is not a object, is returned.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> é igual a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> a comparar com a atual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: if value is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se value é igual a atual objeto; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Funciona como uma função de hash para <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: It is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: É adequado para utilização em estruturas de dados e algoritmos, tais como uma tabela hash de hash.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>valor que representa o código hash para o objeto atual.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Compare two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> strings for equality.
trans-unit.target: Comparar dois <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> cadeias de igualdade.

trans-unit.target: A primeira instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref> para comparar.
